cells.data:
-- traverse f (Node x ts) = liftA2 Node (f x) (traverse (traverse f) ts)
on traverseTree(f, tree)
    script go
        on |λ|(x)
            liftA2(my Node, ¬
                mReturn(f)'s |λ|(root of x), ¬
                traverseList(go, nest of x))
        end |λ|
    end script
    go's |λ|(tree)
end traverseTree
